sentences.en: All light enters the sanctuary through the glass wall surrounding the pulpit.
sentences.cn: 所有的光线均来自于环绕着布道坛的通透玻璃墙面.

sentences.en: All the young men at Pulpit Hill who were eligible - those who were twenty - one - were going into service.
sentences.cn: 讲坛山上所有适龄的青年 -- 也就是说,所有二十一 岁 的青年 -- 都去入伍了.

sentences.en: Among the ruins is a pulpit where Xuan Zang had reputedly preached to crowds.
sentences.cn: 古城中,至今留有唐僧的讲经台.

sentences.en: But if I ever hear of you in any Baptist pulpit, I'll expose you.
sentences.cn: 不过,如果让我打听出你在任何浸礼堂讲道的事, 我一定要揭你的老底.

sentences.en: Even in the pulpit there are moments when mildness of manner is not enough.
sentences.cn: 即使在布道坛上,也有态度不够温和的时候.

sentences.en: He vituperated from the pulpit the vices of the court.
sentences.cn: 他在教堂的讲坛上责骂宫廷的罪恶.

sentences.en: Her present gaiety sounded to him like laughter heard in the shadow of the pulpit.
sentences.cn: 在他看来,她现在的欢快简直就象在教堂讲坛的阴暗角落中发出的笑声.

sentences.en: I spoke from the pulpit ad lib.
sentences.cn: 我在讲坛上发表即兴演说。

sentences.en: Let the pulpit resound with the doctrines and sentiments of religious liberty.
sentences.cn: 让我们的讲坛回荡着宗教自由的主张和意见.

sentences.en: Only the president has sufficient stature and bully pulpit to ease relations between different social groupings.
sentences.cn: 总统才有那种高度和号召力,可以去融合族群.

sentences.en: Son: Put the clock right behind the pulpit.
sentences.cn: 儿子: 那就把钟放在讲坛的后面.

sentences.en: The eloquent and ornate carving a church pulpit was done by Indian hands.
sentences.cn: 教堂讲坛上生动而华丽的雕刻是印第安人的手笔.

sentences.en: The pews, the pulpit and the altar are of a piece with the simple elegance of the church itself.
sentences.cn: 长木椅 、 布道坛和祭坛都与教堂朴素高雅的气氛一致.

sentences.en: The pulpit is against horse racing on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 教士们反对星期天赛马.

sentences.en: The time came for the sermon and he ascended the pulpit steps.
sentences.cn: 布道的时间到了，他迈上了讲坛的台阶。

sentences.en: They turn the pulpit into a forum for personal confession and group therapy.
sentences.cn: 他们把讲坛变为他们个人认罪和集体治疗的论坛.

words.tran_cn: 讲道坛；高架操纵台；神职人员

trans.tran_cn: （教堂中的）讲坛，神职人员（教士牧师），高架操纵台，（捕鲸船的）标枪舌，〈英俚〉飞机驾驶员座位
trans.tran_en: a raised structure inside a church that a priest or minister stands on when they speak to the people
